name: Recon™ Extreme Duty Cleaner - 3024
description: Recon™ Extreme Duty Cleaner - 3024 is one of the most powerful cleaning products available anywhere. Formulated to handle the most extreme cleaning jobs, this high pH, caustic fortified, butyl based product provides superior ease of use in removing grease, oils, fats, carbon, wax, tar and other stubborn soils. RECON Extreme Duty Cleaner is a very high pH butyl cleaner for cleaning and removing the worst deposits in fire, smoke and water damage restoration applications.
